metadata.Title: CVE-2013-5987 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in NVIDIA graphics driver Release 331, 325, 319,310, and 304 allows local users to bypass intended access restrictions forthe GPU and gain privileges via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-5987` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcuda1-304 - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-304 - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-current - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-libopencl1-304 - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-opencl-icd-304 - 304.117-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libcuda1-304-updates - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-304-updates - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-current-updates - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-experimental-304 - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-libopencl1-304-updates - 304.117-0ubuntu1
nvidia-opencl-icd-304-updates - 304.117-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libcuda1-331 - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-319 - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-331 - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-331-uvm - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-libopencl1-331 - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-opencl-icd-331 - 331.38-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libcuda1-331-updates - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-319-updates - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-331-updates - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-331-updates-uvm - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-libopencl1-331-updates - 331.38-0ubuntu1
nvidia-opencl-icd-331-updates - 331.38-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-173: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '304.117-0ubuntu1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304-updates package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '304.117-0ubuntu1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-310-updates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-319: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-319-updates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-331 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '331.38-0ubuntu1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-331-updates package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '331.38-0ubuntu1').
